entry.title: Update
entry.content: Our paper Active Exploration for Neural Global Illumination of Variable Scenes has been accept at ACM Transactions on Graphics 2022, to be presented at SIGGRAPH 2022 Vancouver!
entry.summary: Our paper Active Exploration for Neural Global Illumination of Variable Scenes has been accept at ACM Transactions on Graphics 2022, to be presented at SIGGRAPH 2022 Vancouver!
